{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.01625v1", "title": "Why many-partite entanglement is essential for holography", "summary": "We argue that many-partite entanglement is ubiquitous in holography and
holographic quantum error correction codes. We base our claim on genuine
multi-entropy, a new measure for multi-partite entanglement. We also discuss a
connection between the bulk IR reconstruction and many-partite entanglement on
a large number of boundary subregions.", "main_category": "hep-th", "categories": "hep-th,gr-qc,quant-ph", "published": "2025-04-02T11:31:37Z"}
